long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BuyingGroupPro Chrome Extension allows you to:
   • Automatically sync your Amazon orders
   • Seamlessly integrate with your BuyingGroupPro dashboard
   • Save time on manual order entry
   • Track your orders efficiently

   Simple to use:
   1. Install the extension
   2. Enter your API token from BuyingGroupPro
   3. Start syncing orders automatically
